oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Foy Willing And The Riders Of The Purple Sage - Teleways show - Unknown date
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, Teleways syndication. Date on sleeve has been assumed to match disc, though is unconfirmed. Broadcast date unknown, record date on sleeve pre-dates the Teleways audition program found at TR001391_1. Featuring Bob Moon (announcer), Foy Willing, Al Sloey, Scotty Harrel, Bud Sievert, Jerry Vaughn, Johnny Paul, Fred Tavares, and Larry Breen.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Bob Moon) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Cimarron (Roll On) -- Bob Moon introduces Foy Willing -- Foy Willing introduces the band members -- I Cried Myself To Sleep Over You -- Bob Moon and Foy Willing talk -- Anytime -- Bob Moon talks -- Blue Shadows On The Trail -- Closing statement (Foy Willing) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Bob Moon)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Foy Willing and the Riders of the Purple Sage (Radio program); Teleways; Moon, Bob (Announcer); Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Harrell, Scotty; Sievert, Bud; Vaughn, Jerry; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Tavares, Freddie; Breen, Larry
